tasks.owner: Tech Lead + Backend Dev + Product Manager (STOA-Domain)

tasks.description: Define SLOs/SLIs and alerting; establish on-call and incident management process; conduct restore drills; create capacity and cost budgets for AI inference and search
Perform threat modeling and abuse-case analysis for multi-tenancy and agent tool-calling; design mitigations; schedule penetration test; implement cookie consent mechanism

Design and implement inbound/outbound email flows: SPF/DKIM/DMARC; inbound parsing; attachments; implement general webhook handling with idempotency and retries; publish public API specification (OpenAPI) with versioning; baseline inbound email feature delivered
Plan and execute legacy system migration: discover and map data; assess data quality; design migration scripts; run rehearsals and reconciliation reporting; finalize cutover with rollback plan
Define PRD and user journey templates; create Definition of Ready criteria; develop traceability matrix linking capabilities to domain services; APIs; UIs; and tests
Develop Case timeline UI with deadline engine: display tasks; deadlines; events; implement deadline engine to compute legal deadlines and reminders; integrate with scheduling
Implement conversation record entity: store chat transcripts; tool calls; actions per case; enable search and retrieval; integrate audit logging and data retention policies
Implement action preview and rollback UI for agent-initiated changes; integrated with approval flows
Domain events infrastructure: event contracts + versioning + outbox pattern + idempotent publishing
Event consumers framework: retries + DLQ + backoff + observability; standard webhook/idempotency utilities
Case document model: storage metadata, versioning, ACL mapping (tenant + case + role), and audit hooks
Ingestion pipeline for case files: upload/email attachment intake, antivirus scan, metadata extraction, storage, and indexing triggers
OCR + text extraction worker for scanned PDFs/images; normalized text artifacts stored for search and RAG
Permissioned indexing for case documents and notes: full-text + embeddings with tenant/case ACL filters
Case RAG tool: agent retrieval tool constrained by tenant/case permissions; citations + source trace; prompt-injection hardening for retrieved content
Notification service MVP: unified delivery (in-app + email) with preference model (backend), templates, and audit logging
Scheduling communications: ICS invites, reschedule/cancel flows, reminders; integrated with notification service and calendar sync
Case timeline enrichment: include documents/versions, communications (email/WhatsApp), and agent actions/approvals as timeline events
Artifact path conventions + CI lint to prevent repo drift
Standardize worker runtime under apps/workers (events, ingestion, notifications) with shared job framework, metrics, and deployment packaging
Implement SSO (SAML/OAuth) and social login providers
Add MFA using TOTP or SMS and allow users to enable/disable from security settings
Add in‑app onboarding, guided product tours and feedback collection
Project Operating Model & Delivery Playbook (cadence, WIP, ticket sizing, ABC)
Commercial Narrative + Pitch Deck Outline + One-Pager
